soft_title.en: OFA MATE: One to Many Bilingual Corpus Format Converter
soft_title.zh: 傲飞伴侣：一对多平行语料格式转换工具

copyright.zh: © 2020 英语快餐厅 版权所有

warning_read_fail_mark.en: File reading failed. Please choose the markers correctly.
warning_read_fail_mark.zh: 文件读取失败，请正确选择标记项

warning_read_fail_col.en: File reading failed. Please check and choose the right column number for your file.
warning_read_fail_col.zh: 文件读取失败，请核实文本的具体列数

warning_overload.en: Target file already loaded. No need for reload
warning_overload.zh: 文件已成功加载，请勿反复加载!

warning_naming_error.en: No seperate one-to-many parallel files in txt format are found in target directory. Please rename them if there is any
warning_naming_error.zh: 指定文件夹内未找到多语对齐txt文件，请正确命名相关文件

warning_no_file.en: No file loaded, please load a file first
warning_no_file.zh: 当前尚未加载任何文件，请先加载文件

warning_read_fail_unknown.en: File reading error, please check if the conc options are correctly selected
warning_read_fail_unknown.zh: 文件读取出错，请检查选项是否选择有误！

warning_naming_error_mul.en: The multifiles loaded fail to meet the basic naming requiremnt. Please rename them
warning_naming_error_mul.zh: 双语对齐txt多文件命名不统一，请正确命名相关文件

warning_not_ready.en: Sorry, no related bi-lingual data generated, please follow the instructions instead
warning_not_ready.zh: 很抱歉，英汉数据尚未创建，请按提示操作

tip_portion.en: The portion between SL and TL files, such as 1:2 for one SL text to two TL versions
tip_portion.zh: 源语与目标语之间的比值，1英一中为1:1，1英2中为1：2，以此类推

tip_num.en: The mutual line number preceding each sent or para with tab in between
tip_num.zh: 位于句或段之前，用“tab标记”分隔的或处于不同表格中的的统一行号

tip_format.en: Sent or para + tab + title of a chapter or a text
tip_format.zh: 句或段+“tab标记”+章节标题或全篇标题格式

tip_tab.en: Left-Right bi-lingual file with line no. and/or sent seperated by tab
tip_tab.zh: 将行号和/或双语用“tab标记”进行分隔的双语左右对齐文件

tip_seg.en: ParaConc bi-lingual file tagged with <seg>, consisting of pairs of Up-Down SL and TL sents
tip_seg.zh: 格式为 <seg id = "...">正文</seg> 的ParaConc双语上下对齐文件

tip_table.en: Forms to contain text, such as tables in Word or cells in Excel
tip_table.zh: 用于包含文本的表格，如WORD中的表格或EXCEL中的单元格

tip_fill_title.en: Fill in title of the current SL corpus or the collection it belongs to in SL
tip_fill_title.zh: 当前语料名称或所属合集名称

tip_fill_author.en: Fill in the author's name in SL
tip_fill_author.zh: 填写作者的标准的源语姓名

tip_fill_date.en: Fill in the release year of the original text, such as '1971', keep it blank when unavailable
tip_fill_date.zh: 填写源语作品发行年代，如1971；不详则留空

tip_fill_genre.en: Fill in the genre of the text in SL, such as 'novel'
tip_fill_genre.zh: 填写作品文体类型，如novel等

tip_fill_title_tl.en: Fill in the title of the current SL corpus or the collection it belongs to in TL
tip_fill_title_tl.zh: 当前语料名称或所属合集名称的译名

tip_fill_vn.en: Fill in the version of the translation with a number right after 't', such as 't1'
tip_fill_vn.zh: 填写译本的阿拉伯数字编号，以t为首字母，如t1

tip_fill_author_tl.en: Fill in the author's translated name in TL
tip_fill_author_tl.zh: 填写源语作者的标准的中文译名

tip_fill_trans.en: Fill in translator's name, use ';' to seperate when there are many
tip_fill_trans.zh: 填写译者姓名，若为多人，用“;”号分隔

tip_fill_date_tl.en: Fill in the release year of the translation, such as '1971', keep it blank when unavailable
tip_fill_date_tl.zh: 填写译作发行年代，如1971；不详则留空

tip_fill_genre_tl.en: Fill in the genre of the text in TL, such as '长篇小说' in Chinese
tip_fill_genre_tl.zh: 填写作品文体类型，如长篇小说等

pmt_1_start.en: This tool will convert your sent- or para- parellelled text stored in txt, docx, or xlsx files into a json file so that you can concordance them with OFA-ParaConc. Please follow the instructions below:
pmt_1_start.zh: 本工具将已清洁好的句对齐或段对齐语料自动转换成可与OFA ParaConc相兼容的数据文件，请按指示操作。

pmt_1_a.en: Step 1: Click 'Open File' and pick a single file that contains both SL and TL texts.
pmt_1_a.zh: 步骤1：点击“打开单文件”，加载您要转换的某个原、译文在一起的单语料文件。

pmt_1_b.en: If the texts of SL and TL are stored in seperate files, please select the "Multiple File" first, and then click 'Open Files'.
pmt_1_b.zh: 如果原、译文分文件保存，请先选择“多文件”，再点击“打开多文件”。

pmt_2_start.en: The bilingual corpora have been loaded successfully.
pmt_2_start.zh: 您指定的双语语料已成功加载！

pmt_2_a.en: Step 2: Please check each items of the following form to see if the automatically filled information is correct; if not, corrected manually.
pmt_2_a.zh: 步骤2：请核实系统为您自动填充的书名、作者、译者等元信息是否准确，如有误，请手动修改。

pmt_2_b.en: If everything is ready, please click the "Submit" button right under the SL-Corpus Window.
pmt_2_b.zh: 确认无误后，请点击源语语料下的“提交”按钮。

pmt_3_start.en: The SL-Corpus has been submitted successfully. The text appeared in the Content Preview Window will be the final format of the corpus.
pmt_3_start.zh: 源语语料提交成功，正文预览窗口内展示的是待生成语料的标准三列格式。

pmt_3_a.en: Step 3: Please click the "Submit" button right under the TL-Corpus Window, or if necessary, the "Refill" button to cancel your previous submission and fill the form again.
pmt_3_a.zh: 步骤3：请点击目标语料下的“提交”按钮，或点击“重填”按钮取消当前已提交的语料。

pmt_4a_start.en: is submitted successfully, and all corpura required have been sumitted.
pmt_4a_start.zh: 提交成功，所有语料均已提交完毕。

pmt_4a_a.en: Step 4: Please click "Converting Now" to generate a one-to-many json file.
pmt_4a_a.zh: 步骤4：请点击“转换格式”按钮生成一对多字典文件。

pmt_4b_start.en: is submitted successfully, and there is more to be filled.
pmt_4b_start.zh: 提交成功，尚有其他目标语语料等待添加。

pmt_4b_a.en: Step 4: Please click "Next Version" to keep on filling the rest corpora
pmt_4b_a.zh: 步骤4：请点击“下一译文”按钮继续添加余下目标语语料。

pmt_4c_start.zh: 当前目标语语料版本号为

pmt_4c_a.en: Please click "Submit" after everything is confirmed to be correct
pmt_4c_a.zh: 确认无误后，请点击“提交按钮”。

pmt_5.en: Congradulations! The conversion is done and the json file generated has been stored in the directory of savedfiles for your future use. To OFA-ParaConc it, you just need to join it in the corpus directory of OFA-ParaConc.
pmt_5.zh: 恭喜您，数据转码已完成，生成的json文件已为您存储在savedfiles文件夹内，将其直接放入OFA ParaConc之下的corpus目录中，再运行OFA ParaConc，即可对其进行检索。
